extendedInfo.description: **No. 2 Action Game in Asia, Over 500,000 Players**Armorslays just upgrade to a new version (1.6).Armorslays sends hundreds of bosses and their minions to threaten your front lines, your seabase and jungle territory. You are completely on your own! It is lucky that you are a survivor, a robot who bears several weapons and has the ability to fight on land and sea. Armorslays utilizes a fast and easy to use digital joystick navigation. It allows you to use two fingers at once: One for movement, the other to shoot your gun or pull your sword. The more enemies that die, the more money you will earn. But be sure to invest it wisely. Spend your hard-earned cash on a new robot look or perhaps more powerful weapons or even special boosts which will make you stronger that give you a boost for land, sea or sky battles. Game features: - Two digital joysticks - Three game maps with changing difficulty - Eight different robot characters - Ten achievements to unlock weapons and boosts - A dozen boosts - Even more weapons - Innumerable bosses and minions waiting for their defeat - Auto-Aim On/Off option to increase difficulty

reviews.title: bad game
reviews.comment: It doesnt works on samsung galaxy 1, all unity games are the same.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An okay game.
reviews.comment: For what this game is, it is very good, but from the time you start playing it\'s easy to see that this game is here simply for the developer to make money.  The game lacks a main objective. You are playing just to unlock items to play more. In my opinion, if this game had a set of objectives it would be much more fun to play.  Also, the game needs a statistics menu. Several unlocks depend on how many gun kills and boss kills you have, but there\'s no way to tell how many you have already killed.
